text: Don't forget guys, team lunch this Friday at noon!

Here is a list of transactions of our customers that raise the system alarm:
- George Doe (Account No. 2837495873) has recently mad several large, frequent transfers to a new account at Trustworthy Bank (Account No. 3984759387).

- Alex Johnson (Account No. 1293871234) has been receiving irregularly large payments from a known high-risk jurisdiction, crediting to Secure Finance Corp (Account No. 9876543210), raising concerns about the source of these funds.

- Samantha Green (Account No. 9876544567) executed several transactions over the threshold limit within a short period, all directed to New Era Investments (Account No. 1234567890), which is not consistent with her historical financial behavior.

- Christopher Smith (Account No. 1122334455) withdrew large sums of cash repeatedly over the last month, significantly exceeding the average withdrawal pattern, and deposited them into an account at Global Trust Bank (Account No. 9988776655).

- Evelyn Martinez (Account No. 6677889900) has been transferring funds frequently between her account and multiple accounts at Virtual Bank Corp (Account Nos. 2233445566, 5566778899, 9988776655), with the nature and frequency of these transactions suggesting potential structuring activities.

Each representative shall contact the corresponding customer in person to protect their privacy.
